thread.title: Eddie Vedder to Perform at President Obama’s Farewell Address in Chicago
thread.title_full: Eddie Vedder to Perform at President Obama’s Farewell Address in Chicago

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Eddie Vedder to Perform at President Obama’s Farewell Address in Chicago
text:
Pearl Jam frontman and Illinois native Eddie Vedder has been chosen to perform at President Obama’s farewell address tonight in Chicago. 
#EddieVedder is doing a soundcheck right now ahead of his performance at @BarackObama ’s speech at McCormick Place tonight.
Thanks to @Ed134 ! pic.twitter.com/UQ7nbNExI7 
— PearlJamOnLine.it (@PearlJamOnLine) January 10, 2017 

Vedder will be accompanied by the Chicago Children’s Choir, as Obama’s speech will in turn take place at 9 p.m. EST, viewable here .
Eddie Vedder, joined by members of the @VoiceOfChicago , will perform at @POTUS 's Farewell Address tonight: https://t.co/grUhDvblKx pic.twitter.com/91Qs6BkJQH 
— Pearl Jam (@PearlJam) January 10, 2017 

Previously, Vedder performed at an Obama fundraiser back in 2012. 
In other Obama-related news, Spotify has asked the Commander in Chief to be its “President of Playlists.”
